schema:creator: Coupe, Marsha
schema:description:
__Artist's Statement:__ 'YES' is my favorite word. Especially in all caps like this. Even in these precarious times racked with uncertainty and chronic change it's important to say 'YES' more than we say 'no'. I created this graphic using Apple's Pages software. I made each of the nine images, shown here, individually, then layered them to create a single collage. Can you guess how many times the word ‘YES’ appears in this poster?   
 __Participant age:__ 64  
 __Category:__  Adult Age 15+: Graphic Art
schema:name: YES
